name: Save the Queen of Hearts - Demo
name_original: Save the Queen of Hearts - Demo
description:
A tower defence game I made to demonstrate my knowledge on vector maths.

Vector addition: used to change an object’s velocity, for example, making an enemy accelerate or change direction.

Vector Subtraction: compare the location of an enemy to the location of a tower, to find out if it is in shooting range.

Dot product: used to help us find the angle that a tower will need to turn in order to be facing an enemy.

Vector cross product: find out if a tower needs to turn clockwise or anti-clockwise.

Developed in Unreal with Blueprints
